sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Search, Book, BookOpen, Bookmark, Edit, Globe, Sun, Moon, Home, Menu, X, ChevronRight, ArrowLeft } from 'lucide-react'; const BibleApp = () => { const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false); const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('home'); // Toggle dark mode const toggleDarkMode = () => setDarkMode(!darkMode); // Toggle menu on mobile const toggleMenu = () => setMenuOpen(!menuOpen); // Sample verse data const verseOfDay = { text: "But those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.", reference: "Isaiah 40:31", translation: "NIV" }; // Sample recent books const recentBooks = [ { name: "Psalms", chapter: 23 }, { name: "John", chapter: 3 }, { name: "Romans", chapter: 8 } ]; // Sample bookmarks const bookmarks = [ { reference: "Philippians 4:13", preview: "I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me." }, { reference: "Jeremiah 29:11", preview: "For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD..." } ]; // Sample notes const notes = [ { reference: "Matthew 5:3-12", title: "Beatitudes study", date: "2025-03-25" }, { reference: "Romans 12:1-2", title: "Thoughts on renewal", date: "2025-03-20" } ]; const mainContentClass = darkMode ? "bg-gray-900 text-white" : "bg-gray-50 text-gray-800"; const cardClass = darkMode ? "bg-gray-800" : "bg-white"; const headerClass = darkMode ? "bg-gray-800" : "bg-blue-600"; const accentTextClass = darkMode ? "text-blue-400" : "text-blue-600"; const accentBgClass = darkMode ? "bg-blue-500" : "bg-blue-600"; const subtleTextClass = darkMode ? "text-gray-400" : "text-gray-500"; return (
{/* Header */}

Scripture Daily

{/* Main Content Area with Sidebar */}
{/* Sidebar - hidden on mobile unless menu is open */}
{/* Main Content */}
{activeTab === 'home' && ( <> {/* Verse of the Day */}

Verse of the Day

{new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', {weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric'})}

{verseOfDay.text}

{verseOfDay.reference} ({verseOfDay.translation})

{/* Quick Access */}

Continue Reading

{recentBooks.map((book, index) => (

{book.name}

Chapter {book.chapter}

))}
{/* Bookmarks and Notes Preview */}

Bookmarks

{bookmarks.map((bookmark, index) => (
0 ? 'border-t border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700' : ''}`}>

{bookmark.reference}

{bookmark.preview}

))}

Notes

{notes.map((note, index) => (
0 ? 'border-t border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700' : ''}`}>

{note.title}

{note.date}

{note.reference}

))}
)} {activeTab === 'books' && (

Bible Books

{/* Old Testament */}

Old Testament

{['Genesis', 'Exodus', 'Leviticus', 'Numbers', 'Deuteronomy', 'Joshua', 'Judges', 'Ruth'].map(book => ( ))}
{/* New Testament */}

New Testament

{['Matthew', 'Mark', 'Luke', 'John', 'Acts', 'Romans', 'Corinthians', 'Galatians'].map(book => ( ))}
)} {activeTab === 'bookmarks' && (

Your Bookmarks

{[...bookmarks, {reference: "Proverbs 3:5-6", preview: "Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding..."}, {reference: "Romans 8:28", preview: "And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him..."}, ].map((bookmark, index) => (

{bookmark.reference}

{bookmark.preview}

))}
)} {activeTab === 'notes' && (

Your Notes

{[...notes, {reference: "Psalm 23:1-3", title: "Guidance reflection", date: "2025-03-15"}, {reference: "Ephesians 6:10-18", title: "Armor of God study", date: "2025-03-10"}, ].map((note, index) => (

{note.title}

{note.reference}

{note.date}

Click to view your notes for this passage...

))}
)} {activeTab === 'language' && (

Language Settings

App Language

{['English', 'Spanish', 'French', 'German', 'Portuguese', 'Chinese', 'Arabic', 'Hindi'].map(lang => (
))}

Bible Translation

{['NIV (New International Version)', 'KJV (King James Version)', 'ESV (English Standard Version)', 'NASB (New American Standard Bible)', 'NLT (New Living Translation)'].map(translation => (
))}
)}
{/* Bottom Navigation for Mobile */}
); }; export default BibleApp;
